Balance of Life.name: Balance of Life
Balance of Life.flavor: Your spirit companion restores balance by taking from a foe what that foe took from an ally.
Balance of Life.trigger: An enemy adjacent to your spirit companion deals damage to your ally
Balance of Life.onHit: The target takes damage equal to the damage it dealt to your ally.

Inevitable Winter.name: Inevitable Winter
Inevitable Winter.flavor: You call spirits of death and winter, commanding them to surround a foe to sap its vitality.
Inevitable Winter.effect: When the target saves against any effect, you can roll a d20. If your roll is higher than the target’s save, the target instead fails the saving throw (save ends).

Read the Omens.name: Read the Omens
Read the Omens.flavor: You scan the area, mindful of any omen that might prove useful in charting your next action.
Read the Omens.trigger: You make an attack roll, a saving throw, a skill check, or an ability check and don’t roll a 20
Read the Omens.effect: The next time you would roll a d20 before the end of your next turn, use the result of the triggering die roll instead.
